chara.textHome:
I'm Manaka Kurumi, only daughter of
the owner of the restaurant Walnut's!

My deal is cooking, of course!
My skills were honed by the owner
of Walnut's, so duh...
I won't let just any old cook beat me!

Our specialty is our fluffy,
bouncy rice omelet!
You want to try it, don't you?!
I've been blessed TWICE!

Super Magical Girl powers and
incredible cooking!
Hey, how's that for a tagline?
That'll hook people, I bet!

The customers will be heartbroken
if I don't offer second helpings!
I just got a great idea for a new menu item!

This one's gonna make our
specialty menu, count on it!

I won't give up on drawing more
crowds to our restaurant!

So long as you have faith and know what
you cook for, your dream will come true!

I'm gonna work as hard as
I can to fulfill my Magical Girl duties!

Imagine if someone were to die
without ever tasting a dish from Walnut's?
It's just too sad to bear!

Welcome!
I was waiting for you to come to
 my restaurant for a while!
Anyway, come in, come in!

Breakfast is ready!
What would you like to drink?
You've come at the right time!
I just finished selling some bento boxes!

Would you care to join
myself and Sana for lunch?

What do you think?
It's an original Walnut's rice omelet!

It's so good...
You can't help but smile
when you eat it, huh?

Are you hungry?
Is that why you can't sleep? Okay...
I will make you a small midnight snack!
One mustn't get food on the back of the fork.

Yeah, that makes sense...
Next, chapter two...

Chapter two's about basic manners when
eating Japanese food.
I've set the stew to simmer on the stove.

While we're waiting, shall we take
care of our Magical Girl duties?

I can't do anything that would reflect
badly on the reputation of Walnut's.
I absolutely can't lose here!
No one insults my father!

He is the owner and head chef of Walnut's,
and he taught me all I know!

I just wanted a chance to show people
how good our restaurant's food was.

I know that it was as successful as it has
been so far because the food is so good!

If you need a bite to eat,
please come to Walnut's!
Everything we serve is delicious!
Mmm...
Dad's stew is so rich!

That means the flavor is
very deep and refined.
It's amazing! Simply amazing!

I'm terribly sorry...
You came to buy a Manaka
Special Bento Box, right?
I'm afraid we just sold the last one...
Would you try this for me?

I added a touch of mandarin 
orange to the sauce.

I would like to hear what
you think of the flavor.

Whenever I see Sana happily
eating the food I made her,

it makes me want to cook
for her again and again.

No matter how many times
you request it,

I'm afraid I can't serve the
extra large rice omelet.

That's a special dish that I 
only make for Ami-senpai.

In the future... Even if Walnut's is 
always booked up with reservations,

I'll always make sure there 
is a special table for you.
Don't worry!
All prepped and ready to start cooking!

It was obvious that this
would be the outcome!

I'm gonna have a great meal
after this!

How do you feel about
a celebratory dessert?
A full-course dinner for the winner!

I'm Manaka Kurumi from
the restaurant Walnut's!

You should feel honored to be in the
presence of a future 3-star chef!

Mmm! I just hit upon a whole
new way to spice things up!

It's only natural that I could do that.
I'm the future owner of a great restaurant!

This...! This could revolutionize
Western cuisine as we know it!

Sweet! I'm a Magical Girl
AND a top-rate chef...

I may have two roles, but I WILL
carry out all my duties splendidly!

Keeping busy keeps you
in business, ya know!
That's right, I've got sky high ambitions!

Maybe I should aim for those
three stars as a Magical Girl too!
